mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Bulletin_Board( BNO , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER ) VALUES( Bulletin_Board_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#{title}, #{content}, #{writer} )
mapper.select: SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE FROM ( SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM Bulletin_Board ) Bulletin WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY BNO DESC
SELECT COUNT(BNO) FROM Bulletin_Board WHERE BNO > 0
SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE FROM Bulletin_Board WHERE BNO = #{bno}
